storyInfo: Leto visits the island that the Kjeragandr statue is on and encounters an old devotee, who recognizes Leto and invites her to visit Clan Paleroche.

attributes.content: Come, Rosalind, let's learn how to pray to Kjeragandr.
Close your eyes, put your hands before your chest, and call out Kjeragandr's name silently in your heart...
Good job, Rosalind.
You're Mama and Papa's sweetheart, Rosalind.
Mama could never regret giving birth to you, no matter what people might say.
May Kjeragandr bless...
The Kjeragandr looks even bigger up close.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: So that's what She looks like.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Pray... to Kjeragandr...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: What did Mamochka teach me again?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: No, I can't remember. I mean, it all happened before I was three.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I guess I should start praying—
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Close my eyes... what do I do with my hands again?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Stretch your right palm out flat and place it before your chest.
In Kjeragandr's presence, we close our eyes that do not truly see, and bow our overly proud heads.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Drive stray thoughts from our minds, and recite Kjeragandr's name in our hearts.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Come, child, after me.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Okay!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Leto closes her eyes again.
Her vision goes dark, but her senses seem to vastly expand in an instant.
Behind her, the old devotee begins to praise Kjeragandr's name in his raspy voice.
Kjeragandr, grant us springs that quench our thirst, and fruit that sates our hunger.
Kjeragandr, grant us ice and snow that freeze Catastrophe.
Kind and gentle Kjeragandr, watch over us and Kjerag.
The sensation of wind brushing past her cheeks seems to grow with the chanting, the snowy wind roaring in her ear.
A sense of familiarity, rising from a place that Leto does not know, takes her down memory lane.
(Kjeragandr...)
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: (I'm not your follower, and I don't need your blessing.)
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: (But if you really do protect your believers, please, protect Mamochka.)
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: (I wouldn't have come if she didn't ask me to.)
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hm, no, that's not good enough.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Kjeragandr!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Kjeragandr—!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Please, protect my mother! She's a devout follower of yours!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: She told me how great Kjerag is! I'll see how great it is for myself!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: What's that about?
attributes.name: Surprised Tourist

attributes.content: Is that what Kjerag prayers are like?
attributes.name: Excited Tourist

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Ok, that's good.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: What are you doing, girl?
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Praying, of course.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I mean, it's better to pray aloud, isn't it? Make sure Kjeragandr can hear me.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Uh...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Don't want to leave behind any regrets, you know!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Oh, and thanks for teaching me!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Well, I suppose Kjeragandr is hardly one to be picky about petty details...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: No need to thank me.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Kjeragandr sounds like a pretty nice lady!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Just like you, batyushka.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Leto removes her hand from her chest and takes one last look at the imposing Kjeragandr statue, before turning around to descend the steps.
The old devotee sees her face clearly for the first time.
The visage before his eyes, under the sunlight...
The curves of her cheeks, the height of her nose, the shape of her lips...
A sense of familiarity washes over the old man.
It's... you... You're...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: No, it's nothing...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: I've seen plenty of tourists in my time, but no one who's done what you did.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Really? Did I do something weird?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: What's your name?
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Rosalind. It's Rosalind.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Rosalind...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: How old are you, Rosalind?
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Me? Almost twenty.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Are you Kjerag?
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: You can tell?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You look like...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Yes, you really do...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Well, you called it. I was born here.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: But I spent my whole life in Ursus. This is my first time back.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I guess only half of me is Kjerag.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You grew up in Ursus?
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Ursus...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Ursus... that's good too. Yes.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Why have you come to Kjerag, then?
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Alright, stick to what you're doing.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: No, actually, that's enough. Too much is suspicious.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: The girl? It's a long story. I'll tell you over dinner or something. Talk to you later.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Alright? Satisfied?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: For now.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Are you sure the Trilby Asher didn't find anything else?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: No need to be paranoid, Gnosis.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: The Duke would not stay put if things had gotten to the point that you fear they have.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Don't forget the troops stationed in the foothills. Craigavon is no pushover.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: A Trilby Asher showing up on the train indicates that they've sensed something.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I have had dealings with the Trilby Ashers. On the surface, they are the groveling servants of the nobles, armed with nothing but silvery tongues.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: But we can't ignore the fact that they grew up in the embers of an empire at war.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Karma catching up to the two of you, maybe?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: If we're talking about karma, then you won't get far yourself.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Of course I won't. Why wouldn't we suffer payback for delivering a young girl to a Victorian spy?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: She will distract the Trilby Asher. That's why we need the Victorians to believe that she is important.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Do not forget that there will be many eyes on this place, with Kjeragandr's statue complete and the ceremony about to begin.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: We must all be careful.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I don't need you to remind me.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Relax, I'll be careful. It's not a game we're playing here, after all. The Browntails couldn't pull out if we wanted to.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Or rather...
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: If I showed even the slightest hint that I wanted out today, I'm plenty sure I would suffer an 'unfortunate accident' tomorrow.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: ...I see no reason to engage in speculation about the impossible.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: This is for Kjerag. We can only go forward, not back.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: But we can't hide this forever, Gnosis.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: It's too big, with too many people involved.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Even if the Trilby Asher didn't run into the girl today, he might've run into a certain boy another day.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: He will find out, sooner or later.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Enciodes better have a plan, or even the full authority of the Saintess and all Kjerag won't save his hide.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: And if Victoria finds Karlan Trade to be more important, then we truly have no card to play.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: It's good for all of us that the Saintess and Enciodes have taken up different positions.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Sigh.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I guess I'd better cancel my family dinner tomorrow.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Since when are you a family woman?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Isn't that what Kjerag has always been about? Family, bloodlines. Old-fashioned, I guess, but...
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: The Saintess and Enciodes are siblings, aren't they?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I see... I see...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Your mother gave birth to you in Kjerag, but she brought you to Ursus while you were still small.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: You came back all this way, praying before the statue of Kjeragandr and preparing to climb the mountain to fulfill your mother's last wish.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: I see...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: That's the story, basically.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Good girl... good girl.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Smart, brave... and handsome too.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Oh, shucks. Now you're just flattering me.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I'm not.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: You're a blessing from Kjeragandr to your family!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Well, er...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I wouldn't say that... I guess you could say Mamochka was blessed.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: But it has nothing to do with my papa, who might as well never have existed.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Ahem. Well...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Your father... hrm...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: You don't know who he might be, do you?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: It's strange.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Mamochka said I look a lot like my papa, and he's supposed to be the handsomest man in Kjerag. I thought finding him would be a piece of cake.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Could it be...?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Maybe my dad was actually pretty ordinary, and beauty was all in the eye of the beholder?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: O-Of course not! That's not the case at all!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Whoa! Why are you so excited all of a sudden?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: But I figured that's the most reasonable explanation.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Ah... it's hard to explain.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Well, I'm in no hurry. We can talk about it later.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Are you familiar with these parts?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I can't say I know everything, but I do know a thing or two.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: So you're familiar, then...?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Do you know the best route up that mountain?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I hear it's a make-out point or something. Do I need to buy a ticket or...?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: No need for tickets.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Other than Karlan, the seat of the Saintess, all the mountains and rivers of Kjerag belong to the children of Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Who would have asked such a question in the Kjerag of the past?
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: This was a much quieter place back then.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: No sightseeing spots, no attractions, few tourists. Faith was strong in the people, who respected the mountains, rivers, and lakes.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: It has become like this because Clan Silverash wanted to open up to the outside, and the Saintess chose not to intervene...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: What's so bad about opening up?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Well, that's not for an old man like me to judge.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Are you climbing the mountain today?
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Hm... It's getting a little late.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I'm thinking about spending the night somewhere and climbing up first thing in the morning.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Any good hotels around here?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I have a few spare rooms, if it's a roof over your head you're looking for.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: That is, if you're willing to stay in my humble abode...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Of course! Let's go.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Thank you so much! Mamochka always said the people of Kjerag were warm and kind.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: N-Now, listen, girl!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Don't be so quick to accept an offer like that! You need to be careful!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: What would you do if I had ulterior motives?
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Why are you angry when you're the one who offered?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Don't worry.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I went through a lot in Ursus. I'm no pushover.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Don't be a fool!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: How would you protect yourself if your assailant was stronger than you?
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: I'm not a fool...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Alright, I know, you're worried about me.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Actually, I'm not sure why, but I just felt... well...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: I can't put it into words. I just had a feeling...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I don't think you'd hurt me.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Did you find the mark?
attributes.name: Burly Tschäggättä

attributes.content: No. I scanned the island with binoculars, but I didn't see anyone.
attributes.name: Pumped-Up Tschäggättä

attributes.content: We're dealing with a master of disguise. He won't slip up so easily.
attributes.name: Burly Tschäggättä

attributes.content: Then why tell me to look?
attributes.name: Pumped-Up Tschäggättä

attributes.content: Just in case.
attributes.name: Burly Tschäggättä

attributes.content: Our mission is to follow the girl, make sure no harm comes to her, and avoid detection.
attributes.name: Burly Tschäggättä

attributes.content: The Tschäggättä still have a lot to learn about counter-reconnaissance.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: But if the girl has encountered the former head of Clan Paleroche...
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: And the Tschäggättä are here too...
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: What's that—
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: What's that?
attributes.name: Pumped-Up Tschäggättä

attributes.content: I'll take a look.
attributes.name: Burly Tschäggättä

attributes.content: (Imitates burdenbeast cry)
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Just a wild burdenbeast.
attributes.name: Burly Tschäggättä

attributes.content: You never know when a trick might come in handy.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Eek— my back—
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Look, Enya.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Look more carefully!
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: This statue...
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: It's not right, is it? Doesn't look like Kjeragandr at all.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Is that so?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I thought it was alright.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: It's not alright!
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: The face needs to be a little thinner, and the body...
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: That will do, Kjarr.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: It's up to the people of Kjerag. The Kjeragandr standing here is the one that they want to worship.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: You know there's not much can change on that front.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Sigh.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: No more sighs.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Did you hear the girl, Kjarr?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: The one with the loud voice?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Of course I did. Interesting one. Kind of makes sense, you know.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Not even Kjeragandr can read minds, if you don't pray out loud.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Kjarr...
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: People's minds are such complicated things. Who can tell what you're thinking if you don't put it into words?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: You're right.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: So...
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Will you heed the plea of your humble handmaiden, Saintess?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: This statue—
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Nope.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Enya, Enya!
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Not even if you beg.
attributes.name: Enya
